content: **note ** the sale of this pattern in whole or in part original or adapted is prohibited i ask that if you want to share it with someone or post the pictures of your coraline do not forget to credit my new craft amigurumis so in addition to sharing your own work you also share mine and help me keep doing what i love the most heart **materials used** * círculo s amigurumi soft yarns in colors 1798 coroa boots and coat 2790 moderno pants 3588 batom shirt 4005 terra shirt 3081 rosado skin 2620 praia hair and 3668 veludo bag * 2 mm crochet hook * tapestry needle * pins and stitch markers * fiber for stuffing * craft glue * 6 mm eyes with safety lock coraline is approximately 12 5 cm **note ** if you prefer to use another yarn do not forget to adapt the hook and eyes to a size that is more suitable **happy crocheting **
